channel.title: Biohazard-Pkz! Needs help please try to help me with my problem!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/bannerbp.png[/img]
What I need help with is to make a Player follow another player in the wildy when attacking them then when they use spec the person stops following is there a way to make a Public Void or something to make it so they follow while attacking and when they switch to spec? *
[i][u][b]How to Contact me[/b][/u][/i]: 1.Message me on Moparscape 2. Add me to MSN: Migeant5@hotmail.com 3. Send a email to Migeant5@hotmail.com 4. Or Private Message me and Ill give u my phone number I only have texting 5. Add me on Facebook look up (Michael Geant)
[IMPORTANT] You can join my development team by following this link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,481176.0.html [IMPORTANT]
~Proud Owner of Biohazard-Pkz~ ~Mikey~
